item.title: Wall Street braces for Trump’s April 2 tariff deadline—it foresees 18% EU import duties and a 43% chance of a U.S. recession
item.description: Analysts expect tariffs on the EU, a key trading partner for the U.S., to settle at around 18% as recession expectations hit more than 40%.

item.title: Inside the futuristic biotech startup Cellares that’s building a cure for cancer with $355 million in funding
item.description: Why New Jersey is a hub for biotech manufacturing.

item.title: AI avatars’ lack of authenticity won’t stop them from joining the creator economy—and giving humans a run for their money
item.description: Human creators are already competing for attention among the AI slop that’s become pervasive across platforms like Pinterest and Instagram Reels.

item.title: In Congress, Republicans steer clear of investing in Trump Media or Tesla
item.description: Politically, Republicans can’t get enough of what President Trump and Elon Musk have wrought. But they have not put their money where their mouths are...

item.title: Wildfires force evacuation in North Carolina while it’s still recovering from Hurricane Helene—and also hit South Carolina and New Jersey
